item.description:
Do you like karaoke, Looking for a new Spot, well here' the place The Banshee at 934 Dorchester Ave in Dorchester. We start this Thursday at 930PM. This place should rock they have an excellent House sound system to tie into, I've got a great selection of song choices, including your old favorites to today's hits. Easy  to find right near the intersection of Dorchester Ave and Columbia ave, right off the RT 93 Expressway. Just a 10 minute walk from the JFK/UMASS Red Line Stop, less than a 1/2 mile. So come join the fun and make our first night a great night..

https://www.facebook.com/pages/The-banshee/117718140308
item.name: New Spot for Karaoke in the Boston Area The Banshee in Dorchester
